short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn Jenkins Blue Ocean Descriptions into proper HTML!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This package will automatically update the description message in the Jenkins Blue Ocean UI so that it renders as HTML, not as plain text. This should give you parity with the default Jenkins UI (which has supported HTML).
